\subsection{Clostridiaceae}

\begin{small}
Clostridiaceae is a family of bacteria that includes several species that are
beneficial to human health. These bacteria are involved in the fermentation of
dietary fiber and the production of SCFAs, which provide energy for the body and
improve gut health. Some species of Clostridiaceae have also been linked to a
reduced risk of inflammatory bowel diseases.
\end{small}
